short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate query into English with one click and search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool that translates any language into English and then searches in English.
Now supports Google Search and Google Bard.

You also know that Google Bard currently only supports English. If your English is not very good, but you want to use Google Bard, this tool will be very helpful.

It can complete this process with one click and improve your search efficiency.

You can bind shortcuts or use right-click menus to trigger this tool.
